title: API in Python with Flask
description: Bienvenue dans ce cours sur les API.

body.raw:
Create an API in python

Tutorial Basic
## Install Python and create a virtual environment ```sh python -m venv env ``` ### Activate the environment and install Flask ```sh source env/bin/activate # Linux/MacOS env\Scripts\activate # Windows pip install Flask ``` ### Basic API code in python ```py from flask import Flask, jsonify, request app = Flask(__name__) # Fake data articles = [{"id": 1, "titre": "Python API", "contenu": "Introduction Ã  Flask"}] # Routes @app.route('/articles', methods=['GET']) def get_articles(): return jsonify(articles) @app.route('/articles', methods=['POST']) def add_article(): new_article = request.get_json() articles.append(new_article) return jsonify(new_article), 201 if __name__ == '__main__': app.run(debug=True) ```
### API in NodeJs Build API with NodeJs ### API in PHP The marketing site with landing pages. ### API in Golang The dashboard with auth and subscriptions. ### API in Python The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX. ### API in TypeScript The blog built using Contentlayer and MDX.
